mapper.select: SELECT b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, f.save_path FROM board b LEFT JOIN fileinfo f ON b.user_id = f.user_id ORDER BY b.register_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (user_id, subject, content, hit, register_time) VALUES (#{userId}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{hit}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT b.article_no, b.user_id, b.subject, b.content, b.hit, b.register_time, f.save_path FROM board b LEFT JOIN fileinfo f ON b.user_id = f.user_id WHERE b.article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET hit = hit + 1 WHERE article_no = #{articleNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comments (article_no, user_id, content, register_time) VALUES (#{articleNo}, #{userId}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, f.save_path FROM comments c LEFT JOIN fileinfo f ON c.user_id = f.user_id WHERE c.article_no = #{articleNo}
